#summary CnxInfoBridge -

= Introduction =

CnxInfoBridge is the object representing ip address and port.


== `new` ==
_c\'tor_
creates CnxInfoBridge object

|| *named parameter* || *description* ||
|| ip || resolved ip address ||
|| port || port ||

{{{

--
-- creates invalid CnxInfoBridge
--
cnx1 = assert(CnxInfoBridge:new())

--
-- creates valid CnxInfoBridge
--
cnx1 = assert(CnxInfoBridge:new{ip="192.168.100.5", port=6000})

}}}

== `ip` ==
property

ip address

== `port` ==
property

port

== `address` ==
property

address in "ip:port" form
